The person is experiencing feelings of loneliness, depression, and anxiety. They are struggling with self-harm and have a bad relationship with their brother and sister. They also feel unhappy with their body and have a poor relationship with their parents.

Fluent and general expression: The person is grappling with a range of emotional and psychological challenges, including feelings of loneliness and depression, anxiety, and self-harm. Despite having friends and a growing YouTube channel in the past, they feel disconnected and unhappy with their current situation. They struggle with their body image and have a difficult relationship with their parents.

I've turned to self-harm as a coping mechanism, but it only makes me feel worse in the long run.
